: : Kup : :
Kup: Jackie, lad, give me mine, and then I'll take some down to Windlord and Cam.
Kup them remembers someone, and opens a comm.
Kup: Razael, are you around?
 cardhead649 <cardhead649@...> wrote:Wheeljack-X::

"Just hold on for a sec ..."  Jackie pops a hypo out of his wrist 
socket and loads it with a dose of the antidote.  He injects it into 
Rodimus's shoulder.  "You're golden, Rod!  Good luck!"

Turning to Nightlight, he scratches his chin.  "Well, right now it's 
just a matter of giving everyone their flu shots, but I'd appreciate 
the help."

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> 
> Nightlight:
> 
> "I know.." said with a soft voice while a tear rolled down.
> 
> And for a while she didn't say anything else. At last she said with 
> a tembled voice while she was trying to keep her calm down "I 
wonder 
> if you still need help with the vaccine " said the femme who tried 
> to distract her mind far of the dangerous mission that Rodimus 
> had"I'm here to help in whatever you need "
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > 
> > : : Kup : :
> > Kup sees how worried Nightlight is and walks over to her. He puts 
> his hand on her shoulder.
> > Kup: Everything will be alright, lass. I've known Roddy for 
> centuries. He can take care of himself. He is a tough kid. He grew 
> up when the Decepticons controled Cybertron. Before I got him 
> serving in the war, he used to fight off Decepticreeps on his own. 
> If he promised that he would be comeing back, then you can bet he 
> will. I've never seen him love anyone more then you. You just have 
> to understand what all this means to him. Optimus was more then 
just 
> his mentor, he was like his father. And Galvatron or Hydras has 
been 
> his biggest rival, the one that no matter what he couldn't get rid 
> of. He must deal with both of them, for himself.
> > airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:Nightlight:
> > 
> > Nighlight didn't said anything but she didn't fell any comfort.. 
> She 
> > was the feeling that somerthing evil  would separe them soon. She 
> > almost hadn't noticed that Kup was there...
> > 
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > 
> > > : : Rodimus Prime/Kup : :
> > > Rodimus embraced Nightlight tightly, and rubbed the tears from 
> her 
> > eyes.
> > > Rodimus Prime: I know it's dangerous and most likely a trap, 
but 
> I 
> > have to go. Optimus was my mentor. It's because of him that I am 
> who 
> > I am today. I have to meet with him and try to help him. I owe 
him 
> > that much. You dont worry. I'm, comeing back from this mission. 
> I'll 
> > be back with you and Elita soon. I love you both.
> > > Rodimus kisses Nightlight for what, although a short period, 
> seemed 
> > like an eternity.
> > > He started to leave when Kup stoped him.
> > > Kup: What about the plague, lad?
> > > Rodimus Prime: Wheeljack's work. I'll see him before leaving.
> > > Rodimus heads quickly to Wheeljack.
> > > Rodimus Prime: Jackie, I need the antidote right now. I have to 
> go 
> > meet Optimus.
> > > While Roddy is waiting he picks up his conversation with Cam.
> > > Rodimus Prime: Hello, Cam. I am Rodimus. I understand that 
these 
> > cubes are dangerous and cause "big booms." I can see why your 
> parents 
> > told you to keep them safe. Please try to understand this is a 
> > special time. The sickness is here and those cubes could help all 
> of 
> > us. We'll take special care not to cause any "big booms" with 
> them. I 
> > promise.
> > >  airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > > Nightlight:
> > > 
> > > Nightlight heard the message and said anxiously "Will you go 
> > > ROdimus?" she huged him tightly and said while hey eyes where 
> full 
> > > with tears "Don't go, my love, it could be a tramp!!! If Prime 
> > > changed as you told me.. then he might wish kill you... Think 
in 
> > > your daughter... Please... it's dangerous... don't leave us... 
> Plus 
> > > the Plague is outside... you can't reach him without get the 
> > > plague..."
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@a... wrote:
> > > > OOC:taking back Hydras
> > > >  Hydras stood up. His wings spread and fiore exploded from 
his 
> > > veins. "He is 
> > > > cold, I can feel his dark energy, ah yesss Prime I'll meet 
> you." 
> > > he opened his 
> > > > comm, "I'll be there Prime, I'll be there." He looked 
> > around. "You 
> > > all stay 
> > > > here, I shall be back." He opened the hatch. He knew hed be 
in 
> > > danger of the 
> > > > rust plague but he didnt care this was much for imporant. He 
> > > transformed into 
> > > > his two headed dragon beast mode and flew to the coordinates.
> > > > > 
> > > > > (I'll put a profile up as soon as I have a name and 
> > > password...hint...hint hint)
> > > > > 
> > > > >  
> > > > > 
> > > > > Optimus Prime:
> > > > > 
> > > > >  
> > > > > 
> > > > >              In his protoform body, Optimus Prime glided 
his 
> > > stolen ship easily 
> > > > > through the void of temporal space. He was heading to Earth 
> to 
> > > visit some 
> > > > > friends. Not knowing what he would find when he got there, 
> he 
> > > decided he would 
> > > > > need a suitable vehicle mode. He found one in the ships 
> > > databanks. A 
> > > > > Cybertronian tanker, complete with the ability to lift off.
> > > > > 
> > > > >             As he cleared Temp Space he started the scan of 
> the 
> > > truck, every 
> > > > > little detail. Then downloaded the information into 
himself. 
> He 
> > > got up from his 
> > > > > chair, built for the old Autobots and Decpticons, and went 
> to 
> > > prepare. As he 
> > > > > incorporated the designs into himself he thought of all the 
> > > people on this 
> > > > > planet. He was ready.
> > > > > 
> > > > >             He touched his chest, the change to actual bot 
> had 
> > > hurt his combined 
> > > > > Spark. Prime was shocked as he entered the atmosphere.
> > > > > 
> > > > >             In the deep Prime voice that had once declared 
> to 
> > > Megatron that "one 
> > > > > shall stand; one shall fall" he boomed, "Magnus would dare 
> > > betray me like that?" 
> > > > > He didn't even sit down as he entered the atmosphere, the 
> ship 
> > > shook. He was 
> > > > > searching for the bomb that he knew Magnus had planted on 
> the 
> > > ship. "Oh, crap."
> > > > > 
> > > > >             The ship's thrusters exploded, but the rest of 
> the 
> > > ship didn't. 
> > > > > Instead, it careened out of control and slammed into the 
> > ground, 
> > > throwing Prime 
> > > > > out of the hatch. He slid across the ground as his ship 
> stopped.
> > > > > 
> > > > >             When he stopped and got up he checked himself 
> over. 
> > > He was in full 
> > > > > operation, just his good looks were damaged. He walked back 
> to 
> > > the ship to look. 
> > > > > He was in bad shape, his face had been ripped apart, and 
the 
> > > visor over his 
> > > > > ocular systems. Now everyone could see the protoform 
> > underneath, 
> > > the red eye 
> > > > > that turned and looked. His faceplate was smashed and 
> dented, 
> > > and his 
> > > > > "windshield" chest was broken, so one could see the 
shoulder 
> > > joints on the > inside. All in all he looked like some sort of 
> > robot 
> > > sent back from the future, 
> > > > > to change the future. His arm was a bit ripped up too, but 
> he 
> > > could live with 
> > > > > that.
> > > > > 
> > > > >             Luckily for him, the communications boxes on 
> these 
> > > pods were nearly 
> > > > > indestructible. He would need it to talk to the other bots. 
> > > First though was 
> > > > > Rodimus and Hydra.
> > > > > 
> > > > >             "Rodimus Prime," he started, with disgust, "and 
> the 
> > > one known as 
> > > > > Hydra. I have a message for you. Magnus is dead. He was 
> killed 
> > > trying to stop 
> > > > > me. But he was unsuccessful. I am requesting a meeting with 
> > both 
> > > of you, at 
> > > > > these coordinates. [Punches in coordinates] Know that if 
you 
> > > decide to betray my 
> > > > > trust and come with soldiers, I will kill all of you. I 
will 
> > > know�"
> > > > > 
> > > > >             With that he cut off the transmission and 
> waited, 
> > > checking over his 
> > > > > guns�.
> > > > >
